## TRichText type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type TRichText = {
    edit(fromIdx: number, toIdx: number, context: string, attributes?: Record<string, string>): boolean;
    setStyle(fromIdx: number, toIdx: number, attributes: Record<string, string>): boolean;
    select(fromIdx: number, toIdx: number): boolean;
    getAnnotatedString(): string;

};
```
